entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
